Detailed Description

Base class for our custom exceptions.

TODO: better name

So that we can catch this custom exception type and handle all of our exceptions dynamically.

Date:
Feb 13, 2011
Author:
Matthew Todd

def ubuntu_updates_avail.CustomException.__repr__ (   self  ) 

Defines default repr() implementation.

As long as subclasses don't have any other attributes besides error, then they don't need to override this implementation.

def ubuntu_updates_avail.CustomException.__str__ (   self  ) 

Default str() implementation.

Sub classes will likely want to override this as using the class name is somewhat terse and not very 'informal'.

Reimplemented in ubuntu_updates_avail.NoNetworkError, ubuntu_updates_avail.UpdateError, ubuntu_updates_avail.UpgradeSimulError, ubuntu_updates_avail.UpgradeOutputParseError, and ubuntu_updates_avail.GenerateOutputError.
